imageProcessing.title: Image Processing
imageProcessing.description: PixFlow is an image editor that works 100% in your browser. This means:
points: All images are processed locally on your device
No images are uploaded to external servers
Your files never leave your device

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: PixFlow does not store any personal information or images on servers. All information is processed in the browser's temporary memory and is deleted when you close the application.
